creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Panel of k'ossu depicting the Taoist Immortal Tsao Kuo Ch'ia, with his emblem, the castanets. He wears a green robe with cloud design in red, blue and tan, and a black, court headdress. Mountainous landscape in blue, yellow, green, tan, an brick red with waves of sea at the bottom. Tsao is the patron saint of actors. K'ossu worn, with signs of an old seam at left. Former Classification: Textiles - Tapestry
title: Panel Fragment
